participant_1.background:
I am an Indian-American wedding photographer.
i go visit them sometimes.
i went to college.
I spent my birthday riding my boat and listening to folk metal.
i have a cat named seven of nine.

participant_2.background:
I have started baking for my family and friends.
I do my laundry every week, except for the Renaissance Faire outfit.
My smartphone is my most valued material possession because it is an essential tool for my life
I like to listen to music as a way to relax after a day of welding and working towards my goal of skydiving.
I only dress up for special occasions because I prefer to be comfortable in my own skin.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I just got back from baking a cake for my friend's birthday.
That sounds delicious! What kind of cake did you make?
I made a chocolate cake with chocolate frosting and chocolate chips.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I love chocolate cake.
Me too! It's my favorite kind of cake.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I like to listen to music, watch movies, and read books.
I like those things too! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like to listen to a variety of music, but my favorite genres are rock and hip-hop.
I like those genres too! What are some of your favorite bands or artists?
Some of my favorite bands are The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and The Doors.
I love those bands! They're all classic rock legends.
Yes, they are! I also like to listen to some newer bands like The Killers and Imagine Dragons.
I like those bands too! I'm a big fan of Imagine Dragons.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
It's nice to meet someone who has similar interests.
Yes, it is! It's always nice to have someone to talk to about music.
I agree! What are some of your favorite movies?
Some of my favorite movies are The Shawshank Redemption, The Godfather, and The Dark Knight.
I love all of those movies! They're all classics.
Yes, they are! I also like to watch some newer movies like The Martian and Deadpool.
I like those movies too! I'm a big fan of sci-fi and superhero movies.
Me too! I love how they can be so imaginative and creative.
I agree! They're always so much fun to watch.
Yes, they are! I'm glad we have similar interests in music and movies.
Me too! It's always nice to talk to someone who likes the same things as you.
I agree! It's been nice talking to you.
You too! I hope we can talk again soon.
Me too! Bye.
